error.select_token_token: This token pair is not supported yet
error.source_amount_too_high: Source amount is too high. Your balance is insufficient

error.dest_amount_too_high_cap: Amount is over your cap. Dest amount should be smaller than ${ cap } ETH
error.source_amount_rate_error: Cannot exchange at the moment. Please come back later
error.source_amount_too_high_for_reserve: Source amount is too high (pair is not available for trading at the moment)
error.source_amount_is_not_number: Source amount is not a number
error.not_possess_kgt: There seems to be a problem with your address, please contact us for more details
error.cannot_connect_metamask: Cannot get metamask account. You probably did not login in Metamask
error.no_balance: Your address does not have any tokens that we support. Please import another address
error.clear_data_timeout: We've cleared all your data because your session is timed out ${time} minutes
error.network_error: Cannot connect to node right now. Trying to reconnect...
error.node_error: There are some problems with nodes. Please try again in a while
error.term_error: You must agree terms and services!
error.path_not_support_by_trezor: This path is not supported by Trezor
error.check_right_application_selected: Check if right application is selected
error.metamask_not_install: Cannot connect to metamask. Please make sure you have metamask installed
error.browser_not_support_metamask:
Metamask is not supported on ${browser} browser.

error.browser_not_support_ledger:
Ledger is not supported on ${browser} browser.
Please use Chrome instead.
error.ledger_plugged_in: - Your Ledger is properly plugged in.
error.ledger_logged_in: - You have logged into your Ledger.
error.gas_price_limit: Gas price must be smaller than or equal to ${maxGas} Gwei
error.issue_token_ether: Failed because of sending ether along the tx when it is trying to trade token to ether
error.issue_allowance: Failed because allowance is lower than srcAmount
error.issue_balance: Failed because token balance is lower than srcAmount
error.issue_ether_amount: Failed because the user didn't send the exact amount of ether along
error.issue_user_cap: Failed because the source amount exceeded user cap
error.min_rate_too_high: Your min rate is too high!
error.ledger_global_err:
Cannot connect to your Ledger. Please check if:
- Your Ledger is properly plugged in.
- You have logged into your Ledger.
- You have launched Ethereum Application on your Ledger.
- "Browser Support" has been enabled in your Ledger. Learn to enable "Browser Support" here.
error.need_to_config_env_ledger: You need to configure your Linux device to access Ledger. Instruction here.
error.ledger_not_enable_contract:
Please check if:
- "Contract Data" has been enabled in your Ledger. Instruction here.
error.invalid_path_or_session_expired: Cannot get address from this path. Please check your path is valid or Ledger is connected.
error.path_is_invalid: Invalid path. Please choose another one.
error.ledger_time_out: Your session on Ledger is expired. Please log in  again to continue.
error.eth_balance_not_enough_for_fee: Your Eth balance is not enough for transaction fee
error.handle_amount: Kyber cannot handle your amount, please reduce amount
error.kyber_maintain: This pair is temporarily under maintenance
error.exchange_enable: You have exceeded your daily limit! You might trade again tomorrow at 00:00 UTC+0
error.min_rate_greater_expected_rate: Your configured minimal exchange rate is higher than what is recommended by KyberNetwork. Your exchange has high chance to fail
error.exceed_daily_volumn: You may want to register with us to have higher trade limits
error.broadcast_tx: Potentially Failed! We likely couldn't broadcast the transaction to the blockchain. Please check on Etherscan to verify.

info.title: Kyber Testnet
info.warning:
DO NOT send real ethers or tokens to any of the addresses above.

They are testnet addresses only!

terms.title: KyberSwap - Terms of Use
terms.content: Kyber testnet swap provides a platform for experimenting and understanding our exchange and payment services. The current implementation is not secure in any way. Using it may cause loss of funds and could compromise user privacy. The user is accountable and responsible for any outcome for the use of Kyber testnet wallet.
terms.use_real: DO NOT USE REAL ETHEREUM ACCOUNTS!!!
